document_data.name: Thear
document_data.mainbody: '''Thear''' was a [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[cleric]] of [[Tempus]] who resided in [[Shadowdale]].
document_data.Description: Thear's face was dominated by a sizable nose, framed by a mane of shoulder-length white-and-gray hair with a matching beard. He wore dark green robes underneath his armor.
document_data.Personality: He had a reputation for flying into fits of rage, typical for clerics of his religion.
document_data.Possessions: In addition to his enchanted suit of [[plate mail]], Thear owned an extremely potent magical [[warhammer]].
document_data.Activities: Owing to his explosive temperament, the residents of Shadowdale tended to avoid Thear. He was very interested in purchasing a warhorse, but had trouble finding a suitable mount: he found [[horse]]s too large, and [[pony|ponies]] too scrawny.
